item.title: Aflac says hackers may have stolen costumers' personal information
item.description: The insurer said it stopped the intrusion after identifying suspicious activity on its U.S. network last week.

item.title: Trump administration to shutter specialized LGBTQ+ suicide lifeline option
item.description: A part of the 988 Suicide and Crisis Lifeline dedicated to LGBTQ+ youth — known as 988 option 3 — will close in July, the agency said.

item.title: $200,000 home equity loan vs. $200,000 HELOC: Which is less expensive now?
item.description: Before borrowing this much home equity, owners should compare the potential repayment costs of both products.
